00057 LightDialog::LightDialog(  TLightKit* currentLightKit, QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > sunshapeFactoryList, QWidget* parent )
00058 :QDialog( parent ),
00059  m_currentLightKit( currentLightKit ),
00060  m_currentSunShapeIndex( -1 ), m_newSunShape( 0 )
00061 {
00062         setupUi( this );
00063         connect( sunshapeParameters, SIGNAL( valueModificated( SoNode*, QString, QString ) ), this, SLOT( SetValue( SoNode*, QString, QString ) ) );
00064 
00065 
00066         for( int sunShape = 0; sunShape < (int) sunshapeFactoryList.size(); ++sunShape )
00067         {
00068                 QString sunShapeTypeName( sunshapeFactoryList[sunShape]->CreateTSunShape()->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00069                 m_sunshapeList.insert( sunShapeTypeName, sunshapeFactoryList[sunShape] );
00070         }
00071 
00072         if( currentLightKit )
00073         {
00074                 if( currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) )    m_newSunShape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false )->copy( true ) );
00075         }
00076 
00077         SunPositionTab();
00078         SunshapeTab();
00079 
00080 }

00087 
00088 }

00093 TLightKit* LightDialog::GetTLightKit()
00094 {
00095         TLightKit* lightKit = new TLightKit;
00096 
00097         if( m_newSunShape ) lightKit->setPart( "tsunshape", m_newSunShape );
00098         //if( m_newShape ) lightKit->setPart( "icon", m_newShape );
00099 
00100         lightKit->ChangePosition( azimuthSpin->value()* tgc::Degree, ( 90 - elevationSpin->value() ) * tgc::Degree/*, distanceSpin->value()*/ );
00101         return lightKit;
00102 }

00107 void LightDialog::accept()
00108 {
00109         if( sunshapeCombo->currentIndex() == 0 )
00110                 QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ), tr( "You must select a sunshape type." ), QMessageBox::Ok );
00111 
00112         else
00113                 QDialog::accept();
00114 }
00115 
00116 void LightDialog::SetValue( SoNode* node, QString paramenterName, QString newValue )
00117 {
00118         if(paramenterName=="irradiance"){
00119                 if(newValue.toDouble()>=0){
00120                         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( SbName( paramenterName.toStdString().c_str() ) );
00121                                 if( parameterField )
00122                                         parameterField->set( newValue.toStdString().c_str() );
00123                 }
00124         }
00125         else{
00126         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( SbName( paramenterName.toStdString().c_str() ) );
00127         if( parameterField )
00128                 parameterField->set( newValue.toStdString().c_str() );
00129         }
00130 
00131 }
00132 
00136 void LightDialog::ChangeSunshape( int index )
00137 {
00138         while( (m_newSunShape!=0) && m_newSunShape->getRefCount() > 0 ) m_newSunShape->unref();
00139         if( index == 0 ) m_newSunShape = 0;
00140         else if( index == m_currentSunShapeIndex)       m_newSunShape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( m_currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false )->copy( true ) );
00141         else
00142         {
00143                 TSunShapeFactory* sunshapeFactory = m_sunshapeList.value( sunshapeCombo->itemData( index ).toString() );
00144                 m_newSunShape = sunshapeFactory->CreateTSunShape();
00145 
00146         }
00147 
00148         sunshapeParameters->SetContainer( m_newSunShape, QString() );
00149 }

00155 void LightDialog::SunPositionTab()
00156 {
00157         if( m_currentLightKit )
00158         {
00159                 azimuthSpin->setValue( m_currentLightKit->azimuth.getValue() / tgc::Degree );
00160                 elevationSpin->setValue( 90 - ( m_currentLightKit->zenith.getValue() / tgc::Degree ) );
00161                 //distanceSpin->setValue( m_currentLightKit->distance.getValue() );
00162         }
00163 
00164 }
00165 
00169 void LightDialog::SunshapeTab()
00170 {
00171         SunshapeBox();
00172         //ShapeBox();
00173 }
00174 
00175 void LightDialog::SunshapeBox()
00176 {
00177         connect( sunshapeCombo, SIGNAL( activated( int ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeSunshape( int ) ) );
00178 
00179         //Add elements to sunshape combo
00180         QList< TSunShapeFactory* > sunShapeFactoryList = m_sunshapeList.values();
00181         sunshapeCombo->addItem ( "---" );
00182         for( int i = 0; i < sunShapeFactoryList.size(); ++i )
00183                 sunshapeCombo->addItem( sunShapeFactoryList[i]->TSunShapeIcon(), sunShapeFactoryList[i]->TSunShapeName(),m_sunshapeList.key( sunShapeFactoryList[i] ) );
00184 
00185         //Select current LightKit Sunshape
00186         m_currentSunShapeIndex = 0;
00187         if( m_newSunShape )
00188         {
00189                 QString name( m_newSunShape->getTypeId().getName() );
00190                 m_currentSunShapeIndex = sunshapeCombo->findData( name );
00191         }
00192 
00193     ChangeSunshape( m_currentSunShapeIndex );
00194     sunshapeCombo->setCurrentIndex( m_currentSunShapeIndex );
00195 }
